          <title>
            <string language="en">Activities requiring energy  sitting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivitäten, die Energie Sitting benötigen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités exigeant la séance d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades que requerem o assento da energia</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades que requieren la sentada de la 
energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of six illustrations showing human activities that require energy. Sitting requires energy.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von sechs Abbildungen, die menschliche 
Aktivitäten zeigen, die Energie benötigen. Sitting benötigt 
Energie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de six illustrations montrant les 
activités humaines qui exigent l'énergie. La séance exige 
l'énergie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de seis ilustrações que mostram 
as atividades humanas que requerem a energia. O assento requer a
energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di sei illustrazioni che mostrano

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα έξι απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν ανθρώπινες 
δραστηριότητες που απαιτούν την ενέργεια. Η συνεδρίαση 
απαιτεί την ενέργεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de seis ilustraciones que muestran las 
actividades humanas que requieren energía. La sentada requiere 
energía.</string>
